title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 17
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Suppose a and b are distinct real numbers so that\n"},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\frac { a }{ b } \\quad +\\quad \\frac { a\\quad +\\quad 10b }{ b\\quad +\\quad 10a } \\quad =\\quad 2"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":"\nDetermine the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\\frac { a }{ b } "}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 18
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Determine the total value of all prime numbers between 1 and 100 that are at once have the attributes: one more than a multiple of 5 and one less than a multiple of 6."}]}]}

title: 2002 Math OSK, Number 19
body:
